channel.title: Choosing look of characters? help pl0x!
channel.description:
i was wondering how do i choose what my auto'ers look like at tut island, because the /tutisland() chooses for you, but if seen many people lately with names such as " yongkang001 - yongkang009 " and they all look identical... how do i do this?
help really appreciated
yuhaiyang1 -

item.title: Choosing look of characters? help pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @bobert5696 bobert5696
item.description:
@bobert5696 wrote:

pause the script, choose what you look like, after you hit ok, hit resume, script shoud figure it out

Read full topic
